title: Now that Fizz and Akali have been nerfed
body:
Zed is on top of the mid freelo again. 
Riot's balance policy: Nerf everything. If something (that was fine before) becomes OP because everything else got nerfed, nerf that too {{champion:18}} .. Let's make this game as boring as possible. Remember all those fun times in S2-preS3 with Kha and Rengo? No more of that. They're bland as hell now.
